Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'Exceptionally powerful unit detected. Victory unattainable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'Who are you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'A mechanoid who\'s searching for "Sage\'s" trail.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'You know about "Sage", but you do not know about the Church of Machina?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'If you want to join us, I can provide you with the necessary details.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Not yet. I need more information before I make a decision.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chariot', 3: 'In that case, we can introduce you to someone who can answer your questions.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory582.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the silent mechanoid, Haicma sets foot underneath the scorched earth.'}
{3: 'Inside an exceptionally large cavern hides a massive starship.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_03.jpg'}
{3: 'Artificial sunlight illuminates the interior of the ship.'}
{3: 'Chariot bows at the mechanoid at the center of the hall before stepping aside.'}
{3: 'The female mechanoid at the center smiles, greeting Haicma like a human.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'My name is Arcana. You can call me "Mother".'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Sure, Mother.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Ha! So accepting and compliant.'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: "It's the sign of a great student, Zero."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'So, Mother, what is the Church of Machina? Why are you searching for "Sage"? Who made this starship?'}
{2: 'Zero', 3: 'Asking questions already?'}
{3: "Arcana uses her gentle voice to detail the stories of the machines' survival."}
{3: 'Humans are not the only ones suffering from the Punishing Virus.'}
{3: 'For some machines, those who have awakened and understand "fear" and the concept of machines as a species, the Punishing Virus is a threat to the entire machine race.'}
{3: 'Not to mention the hostility from humankind out of fear of the virus.'}
{3: 'After a prolonged period of fighting and devastation from the virus, the awakened machines have gradually received revelations from Sage.'}
{3: 'Slowly, they gather together, acting in secret on Earth as the "Church of Machina".'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: '...We encountered an "opportunity" during our search for Sage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '"She" showed me a glimpse, a fragment of the future during so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '"Sagemachina will return to the Church, guiding us away from this broken earth to the end of stars."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: '"Sagemachina will obtain the key to the Punishing Virus and enters the door it opens."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'The starship you are seeing is the base we built for this very plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'We are currently searching for the design blueprint of Babylonia. Once we obtain it, we will be able to build something similar.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'How are you going to obtain information on Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chariot', 3: 'We will seize it, of course!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'And the resources required to construct it? Are you going to seize them as well?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arcana', 3: "Don't worry. We have more than enough time, and our technology for surveying, mining, building, and recycling is far more advanced and accurate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arcana', 3: 'So, what do you say? Would you like to join the Church of Machina?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I require time to run a simulation.', 4: '1'}
